Package packfarm

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
packfarm.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
Farm class includes all necessary information in order to monitorize farm animals The class uses Singleton pattern, taking into account that the information relative to the monitorization must be centralized and unique.
Version:
1
Author:
Oihan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addFarmAnimal​(java.lang.String id, int age, double weight)
    Adds an animal to the farm animal set.
    void addSensor​(Sensor sensor)
    Adds a sensor to the sensor list
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> farmAnimalDeparture​(double max_weight, double max_temperature)
    Given an maximum weight and maximum temperature, removes every animal on the animal farm set that its weight is greater than the one passed by parameter but its temperature is lesser that the one passed by parameter.
    static Farm getInstance()
    Returns the Farm class instance (following Singleton pattern).

    Returns the amount of animals in the farm animal set.

    Given an id, returns the animal with the id that matchesthe one passed by parameter*.

    Given an age, returns an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter

    Given a maximum temperature, returns an array with all animals that exceed that temperature.
    void register()
    Gets a physiological register from every farm animal
    FarmAnimal removeFarmAnimal​(java.lang.String id)
    Given an id, removes and returns the animal with the id that matches the one passed by parameter*.

    • addFarmAnimal

      public void addFarmAnimal​(java.lang.String id, int age, double weight) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Adds an animal to the farm animal set.
      Parameters:
      id - animal id
      age - animal age
      weight - animal weight
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if no sensors are available (empty list)

    • obtainPossiblySick

      public java.util.ArrayList<FarmAnimal> obtainPossiblySick​(double max_temperature)
      Given a maximum temperature, returns an array with all animals that exceed that temperature.
      Parameters:
      max_temperature - the maximum temperature before considering any sickness
      Returns:
      an array with all animals that exceed the given temperature

    • obtainFarmAnimal

      public FarmAnimal obtainFarmAnimal​(java.lang.String id)
      Given an id, returns the animal with the id that matchesthe one passed by parameter*. *We are suposing that only registered animal ID's will be passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      id - animal id
      Returns:
      the animal with the id that matches the id passed by parameter

    • removeFarmAnimal

      public FarmAnimal removeFarmAnimal​(java.lang.String id)
      Given an id, removes and returns the animal with the id that matches the one passed by parameter*. Also, the sensor of the deleted animal is added to available sensors list. *We are suposing that only registered animal ID's will be passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      id - animal id
      Returns:
      the animal that has been deleted

    • obtainFarmAnimalOlder

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> obtainFarmAnimalOlder​(int age)
      Given an age, returns an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      age - animal age
      Returns:
      an array with every animal that is older than the age passed by parameter

    • farmAnimalDeparture

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> farmAnimalDeparture​(double max_weight, double max_temperature)
      Given an maximum weight and maximum temperature, removes every animal on the animal farm set that its weight is greater than the one passed by parameter but its temperature is lesser that the one passed by parameter. Also, it returns an array with all the animals removed, and adds their sensor to the available sensor list.
      Parameters:
      max_weight - the maximum weight before considering the animal to be removed
      max_temperature - the maximum temperature before considering any sickness
      Returns:
      an array with all the animals removed
